title: Clinical data template for visualization of summarized data
description: This report summarizes the data of interest (with the \code{inTextSummaryTable} package) and visualize it with any clinical data review plot function.

templatePackage.doc: package from which the template should be extracted

dataFileName.doc: name of the data file of interest

dataTotalProcessing.doc: data processing parameters for 'dataTotalFileName', passed to \link[clinDataReview]{processData}

tableParams.doc: parameters to summarize the data in a table, passed to \link[inTextSummaryTable]{computeSummaryStatisticsTable}

tableProcessing.doc: data processing parameters for the summary table, passed to \link[clinDataReview]{processData}

plotFunction.doc: plotting function to visualize summary data

loopingVar.doc: data variable(s) to loop over, for which each output should be created

loopingNMax.doc: maximum number of elements of \code{loopingVar} to include in the report

loopingTotal.doc: should the total also be computed by \code{loopingVar} (TRUE by default)?

startup.doc: R commands that should be run at the start of the report
